title: Administrative divisions of Mykolaiv Oblast
text:
<a href="Mykolaiv%20Oblast">Mykolaiv Oblast</a> is subdivided into districts ("<a href="raion">raion</a>s") which are subdivided into amalgamated territorial communities ("<a href="hromada">hromada</a>s").
Administrative divisions after 2020.
On 18 July 2020, the number of districts was reduced to four. These are:
Administrative divisions until 2020.
Before July 2020, <a href="Mykolaiv%20Oblast">Mykolaiv Oblast</a> was subdivided into 24 regions: 19 districts ("<a href="raion">raion</a>s") and 5 city municipalities ("mis'krada" or "misto"), officially known as "territories governed by city councils".
